title: Society for Contemporary Art
copy: Founded in 1940 to help foster an appreciation and understanding of the art of the time, the Society for Contemporary Art continues that mission today with an array of free lectures and artist talks, visits to distinguished private collections in the United States and abroad, and access to leading national and international artists, dealers, critics, historians, and curators. For the most recent information on our programs, please contact the SCA at (312) 443-3630 or info@scaaic.org , or visit our website .
